```{r}
#| include: false
# Create a sample plot to reuse later
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)

library(skimr)
library(readr)

cookies <- read_csv("choc_chip_cookie_ingredients.csv")

cols <- c("Rating", "Ingredient", "Text", "Recipe_Index", "Quantity", "Unit")

key_ingredients <- cookies %>%
  filter(Ingredient %in% c("salt", "baking soda", "vanilla extract", 
                           "all purpose flour", "sugar", "butter"))


# Plot quantities by recoded Unit (0 = teaspoon, 1 = cup)
p <- ggplot(key_ingredients, aes(x = as.factor(Unit), y = Quantity, fill = Ingredient)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  scale_x_discrete(labels = c("0" = "teaspoon", "1" = "cup", "NA" = "other")) +
  labs(title = "Quantities of Key Ingredients by Unit",
       x = "Unit", y = "Quantity (scaled to 48 cookies)") 
```
